    • Constructor Detail

      • LolChat

        public LolChat(ChatServer server)
        Represents a single connection to a League of Legends chatserver. Default FriendRequestPolicy is FriendRequestPolicy.ACCEPT_ALL.
        Parameters:
        server - The chatserver of the region you want to connect to
        See Also:
        FriendRequestPolicy

      • LolChat

        public LolChat(ChatServer server,
               FriendRequestPolicy friendRequestPolicy)
        Represents a single connection to a League of Legends chatserver.
        Parameters:
        server - The chatserver of the region you want to connect to
        friendRequestPolicy - Determines how new Friend requests are treated.
        See Also:
        setFriendRequestPolicy(FriendRequestPolicy), setFriendRequestListener(FriendRequestListener)

      • LolChat

        public LolChat(ChatServer server,
               FriendRequestPolicy friendRequestPolicy,
               RiotApiKey riotApiKey)
        Represents a single connection to a League of Legends chatserver.
        Parameters:
        server - The chatserver of the region you want to connect to
        friendRequestPolicy - Determines how new Friend requests are treated.
        riotApiKey - Your apiKey used to convert summonerId's to name. You can get your key here developer .riotgames.com
        See Also:
        setFriendRequestPolicy(FriendRequestPolicy), setFriendRequestListener(FriendRequestListener)

    • Method Detail

      • addChatListener

        public void addChatListener(ChatListener chatListener)
        Adds a ChatListener that listens to messages from all your friends.
        Parameters:
        chatListener - The ChatListener that you want to add

      • addFriendById

        public void addFriendById(String userId)
        Sends an friend request to an other user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId of the user you want to add (e.g. sum12345678@pvp.net).

      • addFriendById

        public void addFriendById(String userId,
                          FriendGroup friendGroup)
        Sends an friend request to an other user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId of the user you want to add (e.g. sum12345678@pvp.net).
        friendGroup - The FriendGroup you want to put this user in.

      • addFriendById

        public void addFriendById(String userId,
                          String name)
        Sends an friend request to an other user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId of the user you want to add (e.g. sum12345678@pvp.net).
        name - The name you want to assign to this user.

      • addFriendById

        public void addFriendById(String userId,
                          String name,
                          FriendGroup friendGroup)
        Sends an friend request to an other user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId of the user you want to add (e.g. sum12345678@pvp.net).
        name - The name you want to assign to this user.
        friendGroup - The FriendGroup you want to put this user in.

      • addFriendByName

        public boolean addFriendByName(String name)
        Sends an friend request to an other user. An Riot API key is required for this.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Friend you want to add (case insensitive)
        Returns:
        True if succesful otherwise false.

      • addFriendByName

        public boolean addFriendByName(String name,
                               FriendGroup friendGroup)
        Sends an friend request to an other user. An Riot API key is required for this.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Friend you want to add (case insensitive)
        friendGroup - The FriendGroup you want to put this user in.
        Returns:
        True if succesful otherwise false.

      • addFriendGroup

        public FriendGroup addFriendGroup(String name)
        Creates a new FriendGroup. If this FriendGroup contains no Friends when you logout it will be erased from the server.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this FriendGroup
        Returns:
        The new FriendGroup or null if a FriendGroup with this name already exists.

      • addFriendListener

        public void addFriendListener(FriendListener friendListener)
        Adds a FriendListener that listens to changes from all your friends. Such as logging in, starting games, ...
        Parameters:
        friendListener - The FriendListener that you want to add

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects from chatserver and releases all resources.

      • getChatListeners

        public List<ChatListener> getChatListeners()
        Gets all ChatListeners that have been added.
        Returns:
        List of ChatListeners

      • getDefaultFriendGroup

        public FriendGroup getDefaultFriendGroup()
        Gets the default FriendGroup.
        Returns:
        Default FriendGroup

      • getFriend

        public Friend getFriend(Filter<Friend> filter)
        Gets a friend based on a given filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter defines conditions that your Friend must meet.
        Returns:
        The first Friend that meets the conditions or null if not found.

      • getFriendById

        public Friend getFriendById(String xmppAddress)
        Gets a friend based on his XMPPAddress.
        Parameters:
        xmppAddress - For example sum12345678@pvp.net
        Returns:
        The corresponding Friend or null if user is not found or he is not a friend of you.

      • getFriendByName

        public Friend getFriendByName(String name)
        Gets a friend based on his name. The name is case insensitive. Beware: some names of Friends can be null unless an riot API Key is provided.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of your friend, for example "Dyrus"
        Returns:
        The corresponding Friend object or null if user is not found or he is not a friend of you

      • getFriendGroupByName

        public FriendGroup getFriendGroupByName(String name)
        Gets a FriendGroup by name, for example "Duo Partners". The name is case sensitive! The FriendGroup will be created if it didn't exist yet.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of your group
        Returns:
        The corresponding FriendGroup

      • getFriendGroups

        public List<FriendGroup> getFriendGroups()
        Get a list of all your FriendGroups.
        Returns:
        A List of all your FriendGroups

      • getFriendListeners

        public List<FriendListener> getFriendListeners()
        Gets all FriendListeners that have been added.
        Returns:
        List of FriendListeners

      • getFriendRequestPolicy

        public FriendRequestPolicy getFriendRequestPolicy()
        Gets the current FriendRequestPolicy.
        Returns:
        The current FriendRequestPolicy

      • getFriends

        public List<Friend> getFriends()
        Get all your friends, both online and offline.
        Returns:
        A List of all your Friends

      • getFriends

        public List<Friend> getFriends(Filter<Friend> filter)
        Gets a list of your friends based on a given filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter defines conditions that your Friends must meet.
        Returns:
        A List of your Friends that meet the condition of your Filter

      • getOfflineFriends

        public List<Friend> getOfflineFriends()
        Get all your friends who are offline.
        Returns:
        A list of all your offline Friends

      • getOnlineFriends

        public List<Friend> getOnlineFriends()
        Get all your friends who are online.
        Returns:
        A list of all your online Friends

      • getPendingFriendRequests

        public List<Friend> getPendingFriendRequests()
        Gets a list of user that you've sent friend requests but haven't answered yet.
        Returns:
        A list of Friends.

      • getRiotApi

        public RiotApi getRiotApi()
        Gets the RiotApi used to resolve summonerId's and summoner names. Is null when no apiKey is provided or the region is not supported by the riot api.
        Returns:
        The RiotApi object or null if no apiKey is provided or the region is not supported by the riot api.

      • isLoaded

        public boolean isLoaded()
        Returns true if server has sent us all information after logging in.
        Returns:
        True if server has sent us all information after logging in, otherwise false.

      • isOnline

        public boolean isOnline()
        Returns true if your appearance is set to online, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        True if your appearance is set to online, otherwise false.

      • login

        public boolean login(String username,
                     String password)
        Logs in to the chat server without replacing the official connection of the League of Legends client. This call is asynchronous. BEWARE: add/set all listeners before logging in, otherwise some offline messages can get lost.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of your account
        password - Password of your account
        Returns:
        true if login is successful, false otherwise

      • login

        public boolean login(String username,
                     String password,
                     boolean replaceLeague)
        Logs in to the chat server. This call is asynchronous. BEWARE: add/set all listeners before logging in, otherwise some offline messages can get lost.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of your account
        password - Password of your account
        replaceLeague - True will disconnect you account from the League of Legends client. False allows you to have another connection open next to the official connection in the League of Legends client.
        Returns:
        true if login was succesful, false otherwise

      • removeChatListener

        public void removeChatListener(ChatListener chatListener)
        Removes the ChatListener from the list and will no longer be called.
        Parameters:
        chatListener - The ChatListener that you want to remove

      • removeFriendListener

        public void removeFriendListener(FriendListener friendListener)
        Removes the FriendListener from the list and will no longer be called.
        Parameters:
        friendListener - The FriendListener that you want to remove

      • setChatMode

        public void setChatMode(ChatMode chatMode)
        Changes your ChatMode (e.g. busy, away, available).
        Parameters:
        chatMode - The new ChatMode
        See Also:
        ChatMode

      • setFriendRequestListener

        public void setFriendRequestListener(FriendRequestListener friendRequestListener)
        Changes the current FriendRequestListener. It is recommended to do this before logging in.
        Parameters:
        friendRequestListener - The new FriendRequestListener

      • setFriendRequestPolicy

        public void setFriendRequestPolicy(FriendRequestPolicy friendRequestPolicy)
        Changes the the current FriendRequestPolicy.
        Parameters:
        friendRequestPolicy - The new FriendRequestPolicy
        See Also:
        FriendRequestPolicy

      • setOffline

        public void setOffline()
        Change your appearance to offline.

      • setOnline

        public void setOnline()
        Change your appearance to online.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(LolStatus status)
        Update your own status with current level, ranked wins... Create an Status object (without constructor arguments) and call the several ".set" methods to customise it. After that pass this Status object back to this method.
        Parameters:
        status - Your custom Status object
        See Also:
        LolStatus
